description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5tftd","text":"This is the protocol for the genetic modification of human induced pluripotent stem cells (hiPSCs) using lentiviral transduction method.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"133a","text":" 1. Cell Lines: 293T and hiPSCs of interest","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":15,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dnb0","text":"2. Plasmid of interest","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e1r5s","text":"3. Packaging plasmids: VSVG and psPAX2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4dkcp","text":"4. JetPRIME buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"47qi7","text":"5. jetPRIME transfection reagent","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aapq5","text":"6. DMEM media + 10% FBS complete mixture","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b32rm","text":"7. 0.45 um PDVF membrane filter","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4s8j4","text":"8. 5 mL syringe","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dicmc","text":"9. MilliporeSigma‱ Amicon‱ Ultra-15 Centrifugal Filter Units","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":17,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":25,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6kcmn","text":"10. StemFlex media and supplement (ThermoFisher Scientific Cat.No.A3349401)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fefu6","text":"11. Vitronectin (VTN)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ds15","text":"12. Polybrene","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"B5CBB5A2D68811EEB9800A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:"}},"1":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"B5CBB5A2D68811EEB9800A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:"}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dm86","text":"Grow and culture 293T cell line in 10 cm plates.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"94ji6","text":"Grow and culture hiPSCs in pre-coated VTN 6 well plates.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9rme","text":"When there are enough 293T cells, seed 5 million 293T cells a 10cm plates in 10mL DMEM\ncomplete media per plasmid of interest.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fpqnq","text":"Grow overnight at 37 deg C and 5% CO2 until 80%-90% confluence.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7a1vi","text":"Change media of wells. Make a master mix in 1.5 mL Eppendorf tubes for each plate as follows:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e1kp9","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9qlmt","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8vc4v","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","0_3":"","0_4":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","1_3":"","1_4":""},"colTitles":["","","","",""],"colWidths":["197","126","189","198","419"],"data":[["  JetPRIME Buffer (Polyplus Transfection, Ref #: 114-15)","  Plasmid interest","  Packaging plasmid VSVG
  ","  Packaging plasmid psPAX2
  ","  jetPRIME transfection reagent (Polyplus Transfection, Ref #: 114-15)
  "],["  500 uL
  ","  500 uL
  ","  2 ug
  ","  3 ug
  ","  1:2 ratio of total DNA (ug): transfection reagent (uL) =20 uL"]],"guid":"48077ADD957C4B37A0E3C9E013E244C8","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["  JetPRIME Buffer (Polyplus Transfection, Ref #: 114-15)","  Plasmid interest","  Packaging plasmid VSVG
  ","  Packaging plasmid psPAX2
  ","  jetPRIME transfection reagent (Polyplus Transfection, Ref #: 114-15)
  "],["  500 uL
  ","  500 uL
  ","  2 ug
  ","  3 ug
  ","  1:2 ratio of total DNA (ug): transfection reagent (uL) =20 uL"]],"rowHeights":[23,23]}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bdltl","text":"Vortex 10s.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"77v14","text":"Incubate 10 min RT *NEVER OVER 30 MIN*.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5oolo","text":"Add all of mix to wells dropwise and rock plate and incubate overnight 37 deg C and 5% CO2.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cesi","text":"Check cells 24 hours post-transfection. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7cfgh","text":"Split hiPSCs into clumps in StemFlex complete medium. Seed 20% confluency or ~0.1M\nper well in 2 mL of 6 well plate. Note: Cell number depends on cell type.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d0i1h","text":"First thing in the morning, exchange the media – add 15 mL pre-warmed DMEM complete media to transfected wells. (This removes the jetPRIME transfection reagent and residue plasmid.).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a1om7","text":"Check cells 48 hours post-transfection.  Collect virus in 50 mL tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"emm2s","text":"Centrifuge 1500 rpm for 5 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1bou4","text":"Using a 0.45 um PDVF membrane filter and 5 mL syringe, collect virus into new 50 mL tubes. Avoid bottom of tube with cell debris","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8oumr","text":"Concentrate 1:40 [~42-45mL of diluted virus makes approximately 0.8-1mL of\nconcentrated virus] ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bjb3s","text":"Collect and label MilliporeSigma‱ Amicon‱ Ultra-15 Centrifugal Filter Units.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":32,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":40,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"C3941D7AD68C11EEB9800A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:"}},"1":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"C3941D7AD68C11EEB9800A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:"}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"79g7f","text":"Rinse column with PBS and spin 2,000 × g for 5 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6dgm7","text":"Add up to 10 mL of sample to the Amicon‱ Ultra filter device.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":39,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cv7i5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"0BF6C730D68D11EEB9800A58A9FEAC02","name":":registered:"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4mmoa","text":"Collect concentrated virus and aliquot 0.2mL per Eppendorf tube. Use virus, other tubes store -80degC for future use if necessary.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"212np","text":"o  \nRepeat adding rest of virus to Amicon‱ Ultra filter device and centrifuge again at 2,000 × g maximum for 10 minutes until all virus is concentrated.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":41,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5mklc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"20C5CC91D68D11EEB9800A58A9FEAC02","name":":registered:"}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8omho","text":"Centrifuge at 2,000 × g maximum for 10 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2lgrc","text":"Remove the culture medium from cells, add 850uL fresh Stemflex complete medium into\neach well of 6 well plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"eofm7","text":"Add 150ul virus and 1ug/ml polybrene into cells. Rock plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e4539","text":"Incubate at 37 C0, 5% CO2 overnight.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":16,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"46njh","text":"Centrifuge at 1000rcf for 90min at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4ov3a","text":"Replace the medium with 2ml fresh Stemflex complete medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dskue","text":"Check the expression of plasmid via microscopy (if applicable).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"e7at3","text":"Begin selection (if applicable).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"elql7","text":"Check the cell status.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1e2eo","text":"Freeze cells to store.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6ga8k","text":"Split cells if necessary. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Genetic Modification of Human Induced Pluripotent Stem Cells (hiPSCs) by Lentiviral Transduction Protocol
